description.overview: Designed and developed dynamic websites tailored for small businesses, blending modern design practices with seamless functionality. Leveraged PHP to implement custom back-end features, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. Collaborated closely with clients to create user-friendly interfaces and optimize web performance.
action_verbs: Led development of multiple websites from concept to deployment, utilizing a wide range of technologies.
Enhanced site functionality by integrating third-party services and APIs.
Coordinated with design teams to deliver visually appealing and highly functional web experiences.

description.overview: Crafted engaging websites for local businesses, delivering customized solutions that balanced aesthetic appeal and technical excellence. Focused on delivering modern, responsive designs tailored to client needs.
action_verbs: Assisted senior developers in building and optimizing web pages, improving load times and user experience.
Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and transform ideas into functional websites.
Provided ongoing website maintenance and troubleshooting to ensure smooth operation.
